channel.title: Comments on: Day 17 – Someone Got Feisty! – Saturday, April 22

item.title: By: Debbie Pollak (daughter of Sarah Pollak)
item.dc:creator: Debbie Pollak (daughter of Sarah Pollak)
item.description: Good morning Sue, I just got home from church and my three year old grandson said...... "God, make my grandma's friend better". I am glad that you are making good progress. I will share more information with our Tuesday water aerobics class. I have told several people about your website so you should be receiving more messages. It has gotten quite cold again. Our pool was closed for two days for deck cleaning. I look forward to being able to pick you up and take you to Gold's. Several people ask me daily how you are doing. I keep telling them to keep praying for your recovery. Everyone is asking for you and we all miss you so very much. Love and another warm hug, Debbie
item.content:encoded:
Good morning Sue,
I just got home from church and my three year old grandson said…… “God, make my grandma’s friend better”. I am glad that you are making good progress. I will share more information with our Tuesday water aerobics class. I have told several people about your website so you should be receiving more messages.
It has gotten quite cold again. Our pool was closed for two days for deck cleaning. I look forward to being able to pick you up and take you to Gold’s. Several people ask me daily how you are doing. I keep telling them to keep praying for your recovery. Everyone is asking for you and we all miss you so very much.
Love and another warm hug, Debbie

item.title: By: Moe Hamilton
item.dc:creator: Moe Hamilton
item.description: Sue: Just found out about this site as I had called the shop to get an update on you....just want to say we are thinking of you and hope you are getting better....and praying for a great recovery....love to you and your fAmily....Moe and The Hamiltons
item.content:encoded: Sue: Just found out about this site as I had called the shop to get an update on you….just want to say we are thinking of you and hope you are getting better….and praying for a great recovery….love to you and your fAmily….Moe and The Hamiltons
